page.title: 05THE VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: NAME{MR AND MRS LORD ADDRESS{STORE MAIN STREET CROXTON {KERRIAL HOW LONG HAVE YOU WORKED AT THE SHOP ? {25 YEARS HOW LONG HAVE YOU OWNED THE SHOP ?{25 {YEARS OPENING HOURS?{8.30AM TILL 12.30PM {1.30 {TILL 5.00 MONDAY TO SATURDAY HALF DAY {THURSDAY AND SATURDAY WHAT SORT OF THINGS DO YOU SELL IN THE SHOP?{GENERAL GOODS AND PARAFFIN WHAT ARE THE MOST POPULAR THINGS? {SWEETS AND VEGETABLES WHAT THINGS DO YOU SELL ON THE VAN? {FRUIT AND VEGETABLES AND GENERAL HOW MANY TIMES A WEEK DO YOU HAVE NEW STOCK?{ONE AND THREE VEGETABLES HOW MANY PEOPLE WORK AT THE SHOP?{TWO
